column5: is niagara falls area division 3 or same division as lake ontario? because i see pike is opened all year and i may that area at the end of the month, with trouts opening too if division 3!.. woot! thanks!
i am not 100% sure but i think its the same div as L. Ontario, ihttp://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/mnr/pubs/fishing/fishRegs/2005/Map_A_fr2005.pdf
because it is on the line, i don't know if it is 8 or 3. i assume it is 3 since it is between lake ontario and erie.
Try this link - its the map - unless its waters of lake ontario ( div 8 ) I would say that it is div3         http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/mnr/pubs/fishing/...ap_A_fr2005.pdf
